name: Bubonic Burglars
description:
A chaotic, random 2.5D online multiplayer competitive arcade game. Dig graves as two plague doctors. Dig out more gold coins than your opponent to win! But watch out for ghosts!

Submitted as a part of Global Game Jam 2023.

Credits: 

Zoi Meaders- Artist

Duncan Fu- Programmer

Ed Slee- Programmer

Eric Park- Game Designer, UI Designer

Janie Chen- SFX, Music

Daniel Nguyen- Game Designer, VFX
